item.description:
11th Annual Salem's So Sweet Chocolate & Ice Sculpture Festival February 8 - 14, 2013  A decadent tradition of delectable chocolate, sparkling ice sculptures and Valentine’s Day shopping…don't miss Salem's sweetest event of the year!

February 10, 2013 Let's enjoy a lovely buffet brunch at Tavern In the Square. Reservation are under Joan. This is a full buffet brunch so bring you appetite. Brunch is $16.99 plus tax and gratuity. There are over 15 ice sculpture displays and we will either walk or take the trolley for a dollar. Lets eat

If everyone can please give Joan $22 to pay (Cover) the Buffet with tax n tip things will go much faster/easier too, so please bring exact cash in hand for that.

In celebration of the chocolate weekend, many of Salem’s finest restaurants will feature special chocolate offerings on their menus, including desserts, cocktails, and inventive sauces. Participating Salem retailers will offer in-store promotions, innovative displays and items geared toward chocolate and Valentine’s Day ranging from a chocolate fondue fountain to Valentine inspired dog treats.

Ice Sculpture Festival – 15+ Ice Sculptures! Starting February 9th at Noon as long as the weather permits! Location: Throughout Downtown Salem Brochures with a map of ice sculptures will be available in various downtown businesses the weekend of the festival.

The Salem trolley will be offering trolley rides around the festival (weather permitting) on February 9 & 10 from 12-4 for Adults $1, children are free. Pick up locations include the NPS Visitor center, Pickering Wharf and Washington Street (near Eastern Bank)

 

Menu - Award Winning All-You-Can-Eat Sunday Brunch Buffet

Featuring a rotating menu of the following items:

Chef’s Carving Station

Roasted Turkey, Prime Rib,
Ham, Pork
{ Chef’s choice weekly }

Chef’s Omelette Station

Create your own omelet
{ Delivered to your table }
